name: Jinbe
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text:
When a card is trashed from your hand by your effect, this Character gains Rush during this turn.
On Play: You may rest 2 of your DON!! cards: Draw 2 cards. Then, return up to 1 Character with a cost of 7 or less to the owner's hand.
